subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brian Gay, helped by an eagle putt at the second hole, charged to a 10-shot victory at the Heritage Classic on Hilton Head Island, S.C. Three ahead of the field overnight, Gay clinched his second PGA Tour title after closing with a sparkling seven-under-par 64 at Harbour Town Golf Links.
